texts.text-4-0: Every night the monkeys climb a tree to sleep in.
texts.text-4-1: They sleep on very long branches.
texts.text-4-2: There, no animal can get them.
texts.text-5-0: One night a mother leopard came to the monkeys' tree.
texts.text-6-1: She climbed it very, very quietly.
texts.text-7-4: She did not want to wake Momo up.
texts.text-8-0: She came near Momo but the branch shook.
texts.text-8-2: Momo woke up and saw the leopard in front of him.
texts.text-9-0: Momo shouted and pointed at the leopard.
texts.text-9-1: The monkeys woke up and shouted.
texts.text-9-2: They threw sticks at the mother leopard.
texts.text-9-3: She jumped to the ground and ran into the forest.
texts.text-10-0: Next night mother leopard came with baby leopard.
texts.text-10-1: The baby leopard was small but it could climb the trees.
texts.text-11-0: The baby leopard climbed the tree.
texts.text-12-0: Momo was sleeping on a very long branch.
texts.text-12-1:
The baby leopard saw him and went very quietly onto
                    the branch.
texts.text-13-0: The branch was very, very long.
texts.text-13-1: The baby leopard came near Momo
texts.text-13-3: It shook and it shook and it woke Momo up.
texts.text-14-0: Momo jumped onto a bigger branch.
texts.text-14-1:
The baby leopard jumped but he could not get
                        Momo.
texts.text-17-2: The leopards ran into the forest.
texts.text-17-3: They did not have a monkey for dinner that night.
texts.text-19-1: “An education and enlightened society of GNH, built and sustained on the unique Bhutanese values of Tha Dam-Tsig Ley Gju-Drey.”
texts.img-0-1: A cartoon monkey smiling on a tree under a night sky with an owl and crescent moon.
texts.img-4-1: Monkeys sleeping on branches of a tree at night under a starry sky.
texts.img-5-1: A leopard approaches a tree where monkeys are sleeping on branches.
texts.img-6-1: A leopard quietly climbing a tree at sunset.
texts.img-7-1: A baby monkey sleeps on a tree branch at night, while a leopard approaches quietly.
texts.img-8-1: A leopard approaches a monkey sitting on a tree branch at night.
texts.img-9-1: Monkeys in a tree throwing sticks at a leopard below.
texts.img-10-1: Illustration of a mother leopard and her cub walking at night under a starry sky.
texts.img-11-1: A baby leopard climbs a tree quietly while monkeys sleep on the branches and an owl watches.
texts.img-12-1: A monkey is sleeping on a tree branch above, while two leopards observe, one on the ground and one walking on a branch.
texts.img-13-1: A cartoon monkey on a tree branch is startled by a baby leopard; an owl and stars are in the night sky.
texts.img-14-1: A monkey on a branch as a baby leopard tries to reach him, watched by an owl in a night sky.
texts.img-15-1: Illustration of a baby leopard falling from a tree branch under a night sky with stars.
texts.img-16-1: A young leopard playfully lying on its mother under a tree at night.
texts.img-17-1: Two monkeys in a tree branch throwing sticks at running leopards below.
texts.sectioneli5-0-0: The story is about Momo, a monkey, and some leopards. In the picture, Momo is on a tree branch at night, resting, while a leopard is seen nearby. It looks like they're both up to some fun or maybe an adventure, under a sky full of stars and a moon. This means the story might tell us about what happens to Momo with the leopards at night!
texts.sectioneli5-2-0: This story is about a character named Momo and some leopards. It's like an adventure where Momo might have some exciting or interesting experiences with these big, spotted cats. Maybe Momo learns something important or helps the leopards along the way. Stories like this can show us fun lessons about animals and bravery.
texts.sectioneli5-4-0: Every night, monkeys climb really tall trees to sleep safely. They pick long branches where they can relax, and no other animals can reach them up there. It's like sleeping high up in a treehouse where nothing can bother them.
texts.sectioneli5-5-0: Imagine it's nighttime in the jungle. A mother leopard walks quietly near a big tree where some monkeys are sleeping. The monkeys are high up and safe on the branches. The leopard looks around, and below on the ground, a little rabbit is hiding. It's a calm and peaceful night with the animals in their natural home.
texts.sectioneli5-6-0: In this story, a mother leopard is climbing up a big tree. She's being super quiet, like a sneaky ninja, so she won't make any noise. The picture shows her doing this in the evening, with pretty colors in the sky.
texts.sectioneli5-7-0: In this picture, there's a quiet night with stars in the sky and a little monkey named Momo sleeping on a tree branch. Nearby, a big cat quietly climbs the branch because it doesn't want to wake up Momo, the sleeping baby monkey.
texts.sectioneli5-8-0: Momo, the little monkey, was sitting on a tree branch. Suddenly, the tree started shaking! A big leopard came close to where Momo was. When Momo woke up, he saw the leopard right there in front of him, which was a big surprise!
texts.sectioneli5-9-0: Momo saw a leopard and yelled to warn the monkeys. The monkeys woke up and got scared of the leopard, so they started throwing sticks at her. This made the leopard run away into the forest to get away from the monkeys.
texts.sectioneli5-10-0: At night, a mother leopard walks with her baby. Even though the baby leopard is small, it can still climb trees, showing how clever and strong it is.
texts.sectioneli5-11-0: Once upon a time, a little baby leopard wanted to climb a tree. It had to be super quiet because all the monkeys in the tree were sleeping. So, it climbed very softly, not making a sound, so the monkeys could keep snoozing happily.
texts.sectioneli5-12-0: There's a monkey named Momo sleeping on a big branch of a tree at night. A little baby leopard sees him and quietly walks along the branch to be with him. The picture shows the starry night, Momo the monkey sleeping, and the baby leopard moving carefully towards him.
texts.sectioneli5-13-0: In the story, there's a long tree branch where a monkey named Momo was sitting. A little leopard came close to Momo, but the branch they were on started to shake a lot. The shaking eventually woke Momo up. It's like in cartoons when characters get surprised by something moving or making noise!
texts.sectioneli5-14-0: In the story, Momo the monkey climbed onto a higher branch where it was safe. The baby leopard tried to jump up to Momo, but couldn’t reach. Momo was clever and stayed out of reach!
texts.sectioneli5-15-0: In this story, there's a little baby leopard that's falling down from a tree. The picture shows it tumbling through the air, with stars in the sky and a branch nearby. It's a surprising and exciting moment, like the leopard is having a big adventure!
texts.sectioneli5-16-0: In this picture, you can see a baby leopard playfully falling onto its mother. They are lying on the grass under the night sky. It's like a cozy bedtime moment where the baby feels safe and happy with its mom.
texts.sectioneli5-17-0: One day, the monkeys were sleeping, and leopards came close. But the monkeys woke up and started yelling and throwing sticks at the leopards. The leopards got scared and ran away into the forest, so the leopards did not get to eat any monkeys that night.
texts.sectioneli5-19-0: This is about a dream for the future. It talks about making sure people learn lots of things and are really happy, in a place that uses special ideas from Bhutan to stay that way. It's like building a world where everyone feels good and knows a lot because of these special rules and values.
texts.easyread-text-0-0: Momo meets some leopards in the story.
texts.easyread-text-4-0: At night, the monkeys go up in a tree to sleep.
texts.easyread-text-4-1: They sleep on big, long branches.
texts.easyread-text-5-0: One night, a mother leopard went to the tree where the monkeys lived.
texts.easyread-text-6-0: A mother leopard went up a tree.
texts.easyread-text-7-0: She looked at a baby monkey.
texts.easyread-text-7-1: The person or character is named Momo.
texts.easyread-text-7-2: She went up on the tree branch.
texts.easyread-text-7-4: She wanted Momo to keep sleeping.
texts.easyread-text-8-0: She got closer to Momo, but then the branch moved.
texts.easyread-text-8-2: Momo woke up and saw a big, spotted cat in front of him.
texts.easyread-text-9-0: Momo saw the leopard and showed everyone by shouting and pointing at it.
texts.easyread-text-9-1: The monkeys woke up and screamed loudly.
texts.easyread-text-9-2: They hit the mother leopard with sticks.
texts.easyread-text-9-3: She jumped down and ran into the trees.
texts.easyread-text-10-0: The next night, the mother leopard came with her baby.
texts.easyread-text-10-1: The baby leopard was little, but it could climb up the trees.
texts.easyread-text-11-0: The baby leopard went up the tree.
texts.easyread-text-12-0: Momo was taking a nap on a big, long branch.
texts.easyread-text-12-1: The baby leopard moved slowly and quietly onto a tree branch when it saw him.
texts.easyread-text-13-1: The young leopard walked close to Momo.
texts.easyread-text-13-2: The branch moved back and forth.
texts.easyread-text-13-3: It moved a lot and woke Momo up.
texts.easyread-text-14-0: Momo jumped on a big branch.
texts.easyread-text-14-1: The baby leopard tried to catch Momo, but he missed.
texts.easyread-text-16-0: 'Down' means something going lower or moving to the bottom.
texts.easyread-text-16-1: The text is about a mother taking care of her child.
texts.easyread-text-17-1: They yelled loudly and tossed sticks around.
texts.easyread-text-17-2: The leopards went into the forest.
texts.easyread-text-17-3: They didn't eat monkey for dinner that night.
texts.easyread-text-19-0: Vision means to see things with your eyes.
texts.easyread-text-19-1: A smart and happy society with education and special Bhutanese values.
